description: Source code defining enums, data classes, and configuration classes for project initialization and template configuration.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, including frontend frameworks, backend frameworks, and databases.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for project initialization parameters, including methods for parameter replacement.

classes.name: BuildCommand
classes.description: Data class for build command configuration.

classes.name: InstallDependenciesCommand
classes.description: Data class for dependency installation command configuration.

classes.name: EnvironmentConfig
classes.description: Data class for environment setup parameters.

classes.name: ConfigureEnvironment
classes.description: Data class for environment configuration commands.

classes.name: OpenapiGenerationTool
classes.description: Data class for OpenAPI generation commands.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Aggregates all initialization information for project templates.

classes.name: TemplateConfigProvider
classes.description: Class providing methods to load and parse template configuration files.

methods.name: from_string
methods.description: Creates a ProjectType enum member from a string value.

methods.name: get_replaceable_parameters
methods.description: Returns a dictionary of parameters for template replacement based on project config.

methods.name: replace_parameters
methods.description: Replaces placeholders in content with actual parameter values.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Loads and parses the template configuration YAML file, returning a TemplateInitInfo object.
